patthana17.10:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.10:1.1_1: (Dve mūlāni.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.10:2.1_0: Abyākataṁ asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.10:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.10:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naabyākato nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.10:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
